patthana16.63:1.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ āsavavippayuttaṁ sāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nasanidassanasappaṭigho
patthana16.63:1.1_1: āsavavippayutto nasāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ āsavavippayuttaṁ
patthana16.63:1.1_2: sāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā naanidassanasappaṭigho āsavavippayutto nasāsavo dhammo uppajjati
patthana16.63:1.1_3: hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ āsavavippayuttaṁ sāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nasanidassanasappaṭigho
patthana16.63:1.1_4: āsavavippayutto nasāsavo ca naanidassanasappaṭigho āsavavippayutto nasāsavo ca dhammā
patthana16.63:1.1_5: uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana16.63:2.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ āsavavippayuttaṁ anāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho
patthana16.63:2.1_1: āsavavippayutto naanāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ āsavavippayuttaṁ
patthana16.63:2.1_2: anāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho āsavavippayutto naanāsavo dhammo
patthana16.63:2.1_3: uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… anidassanaappaṭighaṁ āsavavippayuttaṁ anāsavaṁ dhammaṁ
patthana16.63:2.1_4: paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho āsavavippayutto naanāsavo ca naanidassanasappaṭigho
patthana16.63:2.1_5: āsavavippayutto naanāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā
